entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:18 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
